## SplitsModule.distribute() method

Distribute Funds

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
distribute(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Distribute funds held by the contract in the native currency to all recipients.

## Example


```javascript
await module.distribute();
```
